room_title: Escape room "The Poisonous Shark" by Maggie Valley Puzzle Rooms in Maggie Valley
room_description:
Silver Tooth Sam was one of the most successful pirates of the 18th century. Legend has it that the infamous pirate set fire to his own ship while trying to escape in a dinghy, but The Poisonous Shark toppled onto the dinghy before Silver Tooth Sam could get away.
In his captain’s quarters, he had hidden his largest collection of booty in one place. You have one hour to find Silver Tooth Sam’s treasure before the elusive ship disappears for another year, and if you are still on it when it disappears, you will disappear with it… forever.
